description: Information about probes used to detect targets.
title: Probe
name: probe

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

probe_label.description: The label of a probe used to detect target in this experiment.

probe_sequence.description: Sequence of a probe used to detect target.

target_codebook_label.description: A label used in the codebook for the target.
target_codebook_label.guidelines: Leave blank if experiment did not use codebook.

target_label.description: An identifier for the target molecule.
target_label.guidelines: For small molecules this should be from the ChEBI ontology. For gene products this should be a standard gene or gene product identifier from e.g. Ensembl or UniProt.

subcellular_structure.description: Target subcellular structure. This should be a term from the GO cell component ontology.

manufacturer.guidelines: Enter in-house for probes made in-house.

catalog_number.description: The catalog number of the probe used to detect target.

lot_number.description: The batch or lot number of the probe.

assay_type.description: Type of assay used to detect target.

channel_label.description: Channel ID used to assay signal. Should be consistent with the ID in the channel tab.
channel_label.guidelines: Should be the same as in Channel tab.

codeword.description: In which channel you expect to see a probe over sequencing cycles.
